title: Colin Firth, Stanley Tucci, and An Internet-Famous Negroni | Colbert Classic
description:
Colin Firth and Stanley Tucci have been friends for 20 years and their camaraderie is on glorious display when they play a couple in the film "Supernova." And Tucci's Negroni-making skills went viral during the pandemic, which Colin Firth had the good fortune to enjoy while on the set.
